extDescription.message: Create YouTube time tags with simple keyboard shortcuts

optionsImportDescription.message: Imports and merges the data from the file with the current data.

optionsExportDescription.message: Exports the current data to a YAML file.

optionsImportSuccessMessage.message: Time tags have been imported successfully.

optionsExportSuccessMessage.message: Time tags has been exported successfully.

optionsClearConfirmMessage.message: Are you sure you want to clear all time tags? This action cannot be undone.

optionsClearSuccessMessage.message: Time tags has been successfully cleared.
